title: How to Prolong the Vase Life of Cut Sweet Peas

steps.headline: Pick sweet pea flowers early.
steps.description: Sweet peas destined for indoors should be picked before the flowers are fully open. Some people suggest waiting until the lowest blossom on the stem has just started to open.

steps.headline: Burn the stems.
steps.description: Place the base of the stems in a naked flame (a candle is fine). Alternatively, place them into boiling water for a few minutes.

steps.headline: Put them in a vase immediately.
steps.description: Stand the sweet peas in a vase filled up to the neck of the stems with cold water.
